description: These crackers are packed with goodness and crunch with a hint of rosemary.
name: Mixed Seed Crackers with Rosemary Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 190°C/170°C fan-forced and line two large baking trays with parchment.
Mix all the dry ingredients together in a large bowl.
Mix 350ml of water with the coconut oil and maple syrup in a large jug, pour over the dry ingredients and mix well. Leave to thicken for 5 minutes.
Divide the mix between the baking sheets, place a layer of parchment paper on top and press into the trays to form tightly packed, thin layers, with a rolling pin if necessary.
Bake for 20 minutes, remove from the oven and flip over, peeling off the layer of parchment. Bake for 20 minutes until golden and break into shards once baked.
